version_description: Brought some new cool features like: new cool instagram share, automatic GIF sending via messengers etc.; design updates and, of course, many of new fresh bugs (old one we've caught already) - feels free to catch them all :)

We added a cool new feature: Promo - now you can make a cool Instagram video with the latest and hype content, so you can always be the most hypeable person in your Instagram feed. Enjoy your new popularity :)
We are touched by your activity on Product Hunt. You are the best audience! That means you deserve the best bug fixes in whole industry! Enjoy :)
We fixed some bugs in our app because you deserve it! We love you <3

- SEARCH! You asked — we did. Enjoy!
- New GIFs Layout and improved preview performance. Feel the difference.
- Bugs fixed.

And don't forget: SWAP. SHARE. HYPE.

- "How can you make me swap faster?" — you may ask.
- "Add GIFs to Favorites!" — we will answer.
And something really cool is coming soon! Stay tuned!
Now you can remove watermark and all ads in the app with our new BRO subscription. Enjoy and stay safe!
Now BROs can upload GIFs and faces from Photos. Yes, it’s finally happened!
We fixed a crash while sharing to instagram, so now nothing can stop you from out-of-control sharing of your GIFs.

Now you can swap gifs with two, three and even… four faces. More faces — more fun!
Also, we added a new share screen and killed some angry bugs.
More fun with random promo. And, tsss, try "Who's your comedy double" promo with sound on.
We did something amazing under the hood.

- Gif search via Tenor. Now 10000000500 gifs to reface inside our app!
- Improved face swap quality. Create Memes with your face in 1 click.
- New Home Page for a better experience.
We fixed one critical bug. Now the app should not crash and work fast as usual.
We polished some things and squashed some bugs!
We improved face swap quality on the new “Create Your Memes” feature.
Few bug fixes and improvements.
Few bug fixes and improvements.
We squashed some bugs and improved performance.

We improved reface quality, refined processing screen, and squashed some bugs, of course.
Enjoy new promos on the main page!

What’s new:
- Improved face swap quality for gifs
- Unlimited refaces for BROs
- Upload photos from Gallery for all

Doublicat is now REFACE!
We believe now it’s much easier to search and remember. And our new name communicates better what the app stands for.
Enjoy refacing & stay tuned!

Now you can add a new face from Profile.
Amazing, isn’t it?
We deed something amazing under the hood.
We polished some things and squashed some bugs!
We squashed some bugs.
We deed something amazing under the hood.
We did something amazing under the hood.
We fixed some issues that could be faced on iOS 14. Sorry for delay, we were busy preparing some amazing updates for you. Stay tuned!
Improved stability and performance
Say Hello to Halloween and welcome Tabs with lots of cool content! Reface or Treat!
Reface on images! You asked - we did. Yeah, that's how it works!
Meet the new meme editor right in the reface app!
We've fixed some minor bugs
Thanks for using Reface! We've made minor changes to improve stability. Enjoy!
We've made some minor changes to improve stability. Enjoy!
The app just got a bit better. It’s you inspiring  the improvements — so thank you.
I just called to say I fixed the bugs. Just kidding — it’s 2020 and no one calls anyone.
Just checking in to say you’re awesome and deserve all the fixed bugs in the world.
We’ve been working on your app experience while you were doing the face picking. Teamwork!
We’ve been working on your app experience while you were doing the face picking. Teamwork!
Nothing to report except for a few bug fixes. Gonna be more creative next time, pinky promise.
The app just got a bit better. It’s you inspiring  the improvements — so thank you.

Thanks for not complaining about the bug that no longer exists. We fixed it, and you’re the best.
The reason to wake up every morning is making your app experience better ;)
The rose is red, the violet’s blue, all bugs are fixed, and we love you!
Checking in to say hi to a human and bye to the bugs
Hot News! Your photos can move and sing now. Bring images to life with our new Animate Image feature
The reason to wake up every morning is making your app experience better ;)
Look here, everything’s so clean and shiny. It’s because we’ve got rid of the bugs!
Just wanted to say hi and have a great day. And by the way, we’ve just made Reface a bit better!
FYI: the Beatles are the only bugs allowed in our app
